撇.definition: to throw; to cast; left-slanting downward brush stroke (calligraphy)

撇嘴.definition: to curl one's lip; to twitch one's mouth

撇掉.definition: to skim froth or foam from the surface of a liquid

撇步.definition: (Tw) trick (of the trade); clever move (from Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [phiat-pōo])

撇清.definition: to say a matter has no relationship with the individual referred to, to emphasize one is innocent or in the clear
